Summary: stationary pulsating light in the sky
trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Sacramento
There were 2 other sightings in Sacramento on or around February 25th 2012
divs: Sighting Details1 I was at California Exposition harness race track, i was playing football with my friends when we saw the light in sky, so we quit playing and went to get food and tons of people were in aww when they were looking at the object and then the driver of the start car said have you guy seen the light in the sky, then we looked upp and saw it so we went back to the field to video tape it and then the driver said that the driver and co-piolet of the ambulance were observing it through the window of the ambulance. When i noticed the object it was pulsating the colors pink,blue and in the center white. when i noticed it i thought it was a helicopter but then i realized that it had pink and blue lights which helicopters dont have. the object was stationary when i first saw it then it slowly moved up and down and stopped and did it again. i was completely blown away with what it was. i lost sight of it when it just very slowly disappered in about 10 minutes after i stopped recording and i started recording about 12-15 minutes after it appered.
